response.overview: A dilapidated alleyway is home to a small group of vagabonds trying to survive a night of bizarre and unfortunate events. A drunk homeless man stumbles across a discarded briefcase containing a mysterious elixir. Looking for a quick fix and without any regard to the effects, he injects the substance into his arm causing him to transform into a haggard rampaging monster slaughtering everyone in his path.
response.title: Wolf Juice
